name: Empathy: Path of Whispers
description: Empathy: Path of Whispers is an atmospheric and story-driven adventure game where you explore a seemingly abandoned world through the emotions and memories of the people who once inhabited it, trying to restore the worldâ€™s lost balance by journeying through its past.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 64 bit (32 bit NOT supported) Processor: 2.5 Ghz Intel Core 2 Quad Q8300 or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 550 Ti or ATI HD6950 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 9 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Audio Additional Notes: Using an AMD Crossfire setup might result in performance issues
